title: Okaeri, Tadaima, Mata Ashita
original_name: おかえり、ただいま、また明日
sinopse:
Souta is a part-time employee who has just moved into an old apartment and finds that his neighbor is a little out of the ordinary. Time here seems to flow with such slowness that he can feel so much happiness that we might die!

A love story between two neighbors.
